properties.name: app.jwt.secret
properties.description: Secret key used for JWT token generation and validation.

properties.name: app.jwt.expiration
properties.description: Expiration time for JWT tokens in milliseconds.

properties.name: app.oss.bucket-name
properties.description: Name of the Aliyun OSS bucket for file storage.

properties.name: app.oss.base-path
properties.description: Base directory path within the OSS bucket for storing files.

properties.name: app.sts.access-key-id
properties.description: Aliyun access key ID used for STS token generation.

properties.name: app.sts.access-key-secret
properties.description: Aliyun access key secret used for STS token generation.

properties.name: app.sts.endpoint
properties.description: Endpoint URL for the Aliyun STS service.

properties.name: app.sts.region-id
properties.description: Aliyun region ID where resources are located.

properties.name: app.sts.role-arn
properties.description: ARN of the RAM role to assume for temporary credentials.

properties.name: app.sts.token-expire-time
properties.description: Expiration time for STS tokens in seconds.
